1873   * @see #withTerminalConstructor(Function, Supplier)
1874   */
1875  public static final Function<Object[], Object> terminalConstructor(final Lookup lookup, final Method method) {
1876    try {
1877      return terminalConstructor(lookup, lookup.unreflect(method));
1878    } catch (final IllegalAccessException e) {
1879      throw new InterceptorException(e.getMessage(), e);
1880    }
1881  }
1882
1883  /**
1884   * Returns a {@link Function} suitable for use as a {@linkplain #withTerminalConstructor(Function, Supplier) terminal
1885   * constructor} built from the supplied arguments.
1886   *
1887   * @param lookup a {@link Lookup}; must not be {@code null}
1888   *
1889   * @param mh a {@link MethodHandle} representing a constructor or method that will create an object; must not be
1890   * {@code null}
1891   *
1892   * @return a {@link Function} suitable for use as a {@linkplain #withTerminalConstructor(Function, Supplier) terminal
1893   * constructor} built from the supplied arguments
1894   *
1895   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
1896   *
1897   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if the supplied {@link MethodHandle}'s {@link MethodHandle#type()} return value
1898   * has a {@linkplain MethodType#returnType() return type} of {@link Void} or {@code void}
1899   *
1900   * @exception InterceptorException if any other error occurs
1901   *
1902   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
1903   *
1904   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
1905   *
1906   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
1907   *
1908   * @see #withTerminalConstructor(Function, Supplier)
1909   */
1910  public static final Function<Object[], Object> terminalConstructor(final Lookup lookup, final MethodHandle mh) {
1911    final MethodType methodType = mh.type();
1912    if (void.class.equals(methodType.returnType()) || Void.class.equals(methodType.returnType())) {
1913      throw new IllegalArgumentException("mh.methodType().returnType().equals(void.class) || " +
1914                                         "mh.methodType().returnType().equals(Void.class): " + mh);
1915    }
1916    final int parameterCount = methodType.parameterCount();
1917    Function<Object[], Object> returnValue = null;
1918    if (parameterCount < 0) {
1919      throw new IllegalArgumentException("mh.methodType().parameterCount() <= 0: " + mh);
1920    } else if (parameterCount == 0) {
1921      try {
1922        final Supplier<?> supplier =
1923          (Supplier<?>)LambdaMetafactory.metafactory(lookup,
1924                                                     "get",
1925                                                     SUPPLIER_FACTORY_TYPE,
1926                                                     SUPPLIER_GET_SIGNATURE,
1927                                                     mh,
1928                                                     methodType)
1929          .getTarget()
1930          .invokeExact();
1931        returnValue = x -> supplier.get();
1932      } catch (final RuntimeException | Error e) {
1933        throw e;
1934      } catch (final Exception e) {
1935        if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
1936          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
1937        }
1938        throw new InterceptorException(e.getMessage(), e);
1939      } catch (final Throwable e) {
1940        throw new AssertionError(e.getMessage(), e);
1941      }
1942    } else if (parameterCount == 1 && Object[].class.equals(methodType.parameterType(0))) {
1943      try {
1944        returnValue =
1945          (Function<Object[], Object>)LambdaMetafactory.metafactory(lookup,
1946                                                                    "apply",
1947                                                                    FUNCTION_FACTORY_TYPE,
1948                                                                    FUNCTION_APPLY_SIGNATURE,
1949                                                                    mh,
1950                                                                    methodType)
1951          .getTarget()
1952          .invokeExact();
1953      } catch (final RuntimeException | Error e) {
1954        throw e;
1955      } catch (final Exception e) {
1956        if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
1957          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
1958        }
1959        throw new InterceptorException(e.getMessage(), e);
1960      } catch (final Throwable e) {
1961        throw new AssertionError(e.getMessage(), e);
1962      }
1963    } else {
1964      final MethodHandle spreader = mh.asSpreader(Object[].class, parameterCount);
1965      returnValue = p -> {
1966        try {
1967          return spreader.invoke(p);
1968        } catch (final RuntimeException | Error e) {
1969          throw e;
1970        } catch (final Exception e) {
1971          if (e instanceof InterruptedException) {
1972            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
1973          }
1974          throw new InterceptorException(e.getMessage(), e);
1975        } catch (final Throwable e) {
1976          throw new AssertionError(e.getMessage(), e);
1977        }
1978      };
1979    }
1980    return returnValue;
1981  }
1982
1983
1984  /*
1985   * Inner and nested classes.
1986   */
1987
1988
1989  private static final class NullTerminalFunction implements BiFunction<Object, Object[], Object> {
1990
1991    private static final BiFunction<Object, Object[], Object> INSTANCE = new NullTerminalFunction();
1992
1993    private NullTerminalFunction() {
1994      super();
1995    }
1996
1997    @Override // BiFunction
1998    public final Object apply(final Object target, final Object[] parameters) {
1999      return null;
2000    }
2001
2002  }
2003
2004  private static interface InterceptorProcedure extends InterceptorFunction {
2005
2006    public default Object intercept(final Object interceptor, final InvocationContext invocationContext) {
2007      this.execute(interceptor, invocationContext);
2008      return invocationContext.getTarget();
2009    }
2010
2011    void execute(final Object interceptor, final InvocationContext invocationContext);
2012
2013  }
2014
2015}
